bytecodeparser.analysis.opcodes
Class WideOpcode

java.lang.Object
  bytecodeparser.analysis.opcodes.Op
      bytecodeparser.analysis.opcodes.WideOpcode

public class WideOpcode
extends Op

Wide opcode for localvariables (if there is more than 256 local vars in the method's body).

Author:
Stephane Godbillon

getWrappedLocalVariableOpcode

public LocalVariableOpcode getWrappedLocalVariableOpcode()
Gets the wrapped localVariable opcode. This op MUST be decoded before invoking this method.

Returns:
the wrapped localVariable op.
Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - if this op has not been initialized with init(context, index) before.

getWrappedDecodedLocalVariableOp

public DecodedLocalVariableOp getWrappedDecodedLocalVariableOp()

java.lang.RuntimeException - if this op has not been initialized with init(context, index) before.
